title: NToggleGroupProps
description: Neuron toggle group component for selecting one or multiple options from a set of toggle buttons. Supports single and multiple selection modes with horizontal or vertical layout.

items.description: List of toggle items to render within the group.

value.description: Unique value identifier for the toggle item.

label.description: Display label shown on the toggle item.

type.description: Selection mode: 'single' allows one active item, 'multiple' allows several.

orientation.description: Layout direction of the toggle group items.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
